mapper.insert: insert into base_admin (id, admin_code, name, age, address, email, phone, number, password, img_file, status, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adminCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update base_admin set admin_code = #{adminCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_file = #{imgFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, admin_code, name, age, address, email, phone, number, password, img_file, status, is_deleted from base_admin where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, admin_code, name, age, address, email, phone, number, password, img_file, status, is_deleted from base_admin
